last_episode_to_air.name: Oddities
last_episode_to_air.overview: Encounter aliens and creatures that inhabit the galaxy and fill it with ambient sounds.

name: Star Wars Galaxy of Sounds
overview: The series explores the ambience of a galaxy far, far away through themes such as wonder, excitement, oddities, and more. Be immersed in the hum of Coruscant at golden hour, listen to the light side of the Force as Rey connects to past Jedi, and observe booming lightsaber duels. Experience the nostalgic sounds of Star Wars from across the franchise.

episodes.name: Wonder
episodes.overview: Marvel at the wonders of Star Wars through ambient and iconic sounds that fill the galaxy.

episodes.name: Excitement
episodes.overview: Embrace a galaxy of excitement through turbulent chases, suspenseful duels, and cacophonous battles.

episodes.name: The Dark Side
episodes.overview: Listen to the dark side of the Force as it's used by Sith and other dark warriors.

episodes.name: The Light Side
episodes.overview: Listen to the light side of the Force as it's used by Jedi and other Force-sensitives of the galaxy.

episodes.name: Beeps
episodes.overview: Witness the many different droids beeping about in a galaxy far, far away.

episodes.name: Connections
episodes.overview: Experience the harmonious connections of Star Wars through love, friendship, and alliance.

episodes.name: Oddities
episodes.overview: Encounter aliens and creatures that inhabit the galaxy and fill it with ambient sounds.
